mapper.insert: insert into answer(qn_id, qn_name, q_id, user_id, user_name, type, a_id) values (#{qnId}, #{qnName}, #{qId}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{type}, #{aId})
insert into answer_matrix(id, choice, columns) values (#{id}, #{choice}, #{columns})
insert into answer_scale(id, choice, score) values (#{id}, #{choice}, #{score})
mapper.select: select id, qn_id as qnId, q_id as qId, user_id as userId, create_time as createTime, type, qn_name as qnName, user_name as userName from answer where qn_id = #{qnId} and user_name = #{userName} order by q_id

select.if: select id,choice from answer_choice where id = #{id}
select id,content from answer_blank where id = #{id}
select id,choice,columns from answer_matrix where id = #{id}
select id,choice,score from answer_scale where id = #{id}

mapper.select: SELECT id, qn_id as qnId, q_id as qId, user_id as userId, create_time as createTime, type, qn_name as qnName, user_name as userName FROM answer WHERE (qn_id, user_id, create_time) IN (SELECT qn_id, user_id, create_time FROM answer GROUP BY qn_id);
select id from answer where (qn_id, q_id, user_id, a_id) = (#{qnId}, #{qId}, #{userId}, #{aId})

SET sql_mode = (SELECT REPLACE(@@sql_mode, 'ONLY_FULL_GROUP_BY', '')); SELECT id, q_id AS qId, user_id AS userId, create_time AS createTime, type, qn_name AS qnName, user_name AS userName FROM answer WHERE qn_id = #{qnId} group by a_id;
select id, qn_id as qnId, q_id as qId, user_id as userId, create_time as createTime, type, qn_name as qnName, user_name as userName from answer where qn_id = #{qnId}
